titleStmt.title: SII 8.83: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 83. (A.R. No. 493 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirupuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājarājatevarkku yāṇṭu 2 10Āvatu tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil śrīmāheśvarakaṇkāṇiceyvārun tāṉattārun tevakaṉmikaḷ koyilkaṇakkarum Arumuḷaikiḻāṉ cittāṇṭaikkum viṭuruṭai
yān pirāṭṭiyāḻvān malaikiniyaninṟān Arintavanpallavaraiyarkkum catācivatevar Aruṇakirikkaṉparkkum putuvūruṭaiyān koṇṭi tirunāṉacampantaveḷaārkkum Ivūrk kāṇiyuṭaiya tiruvāmpūr savanan Iḷaiyāḻvi tiruvaṇṇāmalaip perumāḷukkum veṭcikiḻān peruṅkan Atireka
tiraveḷaārkkum miṭṭān miṉavanpallavaraiyarkkum tevaraṭiyāḷ tiruvamapalam piriyātapiḷḷaiyāṟkum kalveṭṭikkuṭutta paricāvatu . Aruṅkunṟaṅkiḻān nāṟpatteṇṇāyirapiḷḷaiyum Ivar tamakkai maṅkaiyarkkaraciyārun taṅkaḷ poruḷiṭṭu Aṇṇānāṭṭu Ellaiyil tiruntikaiyāṟṟai Aṭaittu Eriyum
veṭṭi tūmpum Iṭṭu cimāheśvaranallūr Eṉṟu peru miṭṭu ciṟitu nilamun tiruttukaiyāley Itukku Ellaikaḷum viṭṭu kal veṭṭikkuṭuttu potukaccey maṅkaiyarkkaraciyārum marittu nāṟpatteṇṇāyirappiḷḷaiyun taḷantu Ivveriyum pala Iṭaṅkaḷilum Uṭaintu Āṟum Uṭaiñcu kaḻaṉiyuṅ kā
ṭeḻuntu neṭunāḷ pāḻkiṭakka tammāl ceyarpaṭāmal tam marumakan kāṅkaiyar makaḷ toṇṭaimānācciyār Iveri maṭaikaḷum Āṟum Aṭaittu kaliṅkum Iṭakkaṭavaḷāka Iraṇṭāvatu nāḷile kal veṭṭikkuṭukka Ivaḷum pattonpatāvatuvaraiyum Iveri maṭaikaḷum Aṭaippiyāte kaliṅkum Iṭāte
pāḻkiṭakkaiyāle nāṟpatteṇṇāyirappiḷḷai makkaḷ kunṟan pallavarāyaṉum kampan nāṟpatteṇṇāyirappiḷḷaiyum Uḷḷiṭṭār Eṅkaḷāl Āṟum Aṭaittu Eriyil maṭaikaḷum Aṭaittu kaliṅkum Iṭamuṭiyātu niṅkaḷ Uṅkaḷ poruḷiṭṭu Ivveri maṭaikaḷum Āṟum Aṭaittu kaliṅkum Iṭṭu nāṅka
ḷ munpu ceytatukku Ellai kollai kāṭu kaḻani mūnṟil Onṟu Eṅkaḷukku viṭṭu Irukūṟu niṅkaḷ Aṉupokiyuṅko ḷeṉṟu Ivarkaḷukku Ivarkaḷ Eḻuti Eḻuttiṭṭukkuṭukkaiyāley Ivarkaḷ Irukūṟṟil Arumuḷaikiḻān nampi cittāṇṭaikku Irukūṟum viṭuruṭaiyān pirāṭṭiyāḻvān malaikiniyaninṟān Arintavan pa
llavaraiyarkku Irukūṟum catācivatevar Aruṇakirianparkku Orukūṟum putuvūruṭaiyān koṇṭi tirunānacampantaveḷāṉukku Orukūṟum tiruvāymūr savanan Iḷaiyāḻvi tiruvaṇṇāmalaipperumāḷukkuOrukūṟum veṭcikiḻān peruṅkan Atirekatiraveḷaārkku Orukūṟum miṭṭānminavan pallavaraiyaṟ
ku Orukūṟum tevaraṭiyāḷ tiruvampalampiriyātapiḷḷaiyāṟku Orukūṟum Āka pattukkūṟāka niṟpārkaḷākavum . Ivvūrkku Ellai malaippānpāṭikku poṉa vaḻikku vaṭakku tiruntikaiĀṟṟukku meṟkum tiruntikaikku teṟkum melpāṟkellai munpu veṭṭiṉa Ācāriyan kal
aṭukkai cera veṭṭina tiruccūlakkallukkum Itukku vaṭakku kuttukkallil veṭṭiṉa tiruccūlattukkum Itukku vaṭakkum paṭṭental tenkaṭaiyil pāṟaiyil veṭṭiṉa tiruccūlattukkuṅ kiḻakkum . Inta nāṟpāṟkellaik kuḷpaṭṭa naṉcai puṉcai kaṭamai ko
ḷḷum Iṭattu tiruttina Āṇṭu pāṭikāval koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Itan Etirā māṇṭu kuḻi nāḻiyum pāṭikāvallum koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Itaṟkku Etirām Āṇṭumutal EllāĀṇṭum veli Aṟupatinkala nellum pāṭikāvalum koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum tāḷmaṟi kārukku
pacāṉattukku Onṟumukkāl koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum varakukku kāril Onṟumukkāl koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum tiṉaikkum keḻvarakukkuṅ varakukku Onṟumukkāl koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Eḷḷukku velikku Aṟukalane Irutūṇi koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum puṉcai nilattukku Oṭṭup
paṭi patiṉaiṅkala varakum muṉṉūṟu kācum koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Erippaṭṭi manṟāṭṭuppaṭṭi viṭumiṭattu muppatiṟṟu veli taṟai tirutta Erippaṭṭi Iraṇṭu veliyum manṟāṭṭuppaṭṭi Oruveliyum viṭakkaṭavatākavum Itu viṭumiṭattu tiruttina nilaviḻukkāṭṭi
le viṭakkaṭavatākavum Ippaṭi Ivarkaḷukkuk kuṭiniṅkāt tevatānamāy viṟṟoṟṟip parikkirakañ celvatākavum Āḷ Amañcitevai koḷḷakkaṭavatallavākavum Erimin Ivveriyile kuḻi veṭṭakkaṭavatākavum Ippaṭi cammatittuk kal veṭṭikkuṭuttom tiruvaṇṇā
malaiUṭaiya nāyanār koyilt tāṉattom . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai
Digital edition of SII 8.83 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
